title: Charset  abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
extract: The term “charset” is of course short for “character set”, which in turn is an old term used for a character encoding, which can be interpreted as a) a mapping between sequences of bytes and characters, b) a mapping between integers (code numbers) and characters or c) a mapping between abstract characters and either ...Oct 10, 2015
